card.title: Chris Benoit def. Jeff Jarrett — WCW World Heavyweight Championship Tournament Semifinal

The Revolution (Dean Malenko, Perry Saturn & Asya) def. Filthy Animals (Eddie Guerrero, Billy Kidman & Torrie Wilson) — Survivor: Saturn
Buff Bagwell def. Curt Hennig — Retirement match
Bret Hart def. Sting — WCW World Heavyweight Championship Tournament Semifinal
Meng def. The Total Package (Lex Luger)
Scott Hall (c) def. Booker T — WCW United States & World Television Championships
David Flair vs. Kimberly Page — No Contest
Goldberg def. Sid Vicious — I Quit match
Bret Hart def. Chris Benoit — Final of the WCW World Heavyweight Championship Tournament (wins vacant title)
